titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to convey lands acquired for the Candy Lake project, Osage County, Oklahoma.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 7/30/1997--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Army to convey lands previously acquired by the United States for the Candy Lake project in Osage County, Oklahoma. Directs the Secretary to give first right of purchase to previous owners of such land. Provides for: (1) notification to previous owners; and (2) sale by public auction of land not otherwise purchased.
